name: xrcmp

comment: The topology of the extended reals is compact. Since the topology of the extended reals extends the topology of the reals (by ~ xrtgioo ), this means that ` RR* ` is a compactification of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
